components.name: popAID

staticData.statusDesc: I am fully vaccinated, but have not yet uploaded proof of vaccination in Aggie Health. [A person is fully vaccinated two weeks after they received their final dose of a required and/or accepted vaccine (two doses for Pfizer or Moderna, one for Johnson & Johnson).

I am not fully vaccinated, but I plan to be and will upload my proof of vaccination before Spring Semester starts on Monday, January 10,2022. I understand that a university official will follow up with me regarding my vaccination status. **Information for vaccination clinics can be found here: vaccine.usu.edu.
During Spring Semester 2022, I will be attending courses fully online and reside outside the state of Utah.
I am not fully vaccinated. I am claiming an exemption from USU's vaccination requirement based on a medical reason provided under Utah Law.
I am not fully vaccinated. I am claiming an exemption from USU's vaccination requirement based on a religious belief provided under Utah Law.
I am not fully vaccinated. I am claiming an exemption from USU's vaccination requirement based on a personal belief provided under Utah Law.

components.documentation: Displays data from virtual domain ActionItemContent
components.name: ActionItemContentDetail
CSS
components.value:
<style>
/*
  could also so an @import, but it is probably easier to deploy to just have it in here

  ** the @import method requires stylesheet to be added in through CSS Manager **
  ** URL would look something like this **
  @import url('/BannerExtensibility/cssRender?name=aip.ImmunizationSurvey');
  */


/*
    Make sure all rules are prefixed in a way that it doesn't bleed into other action
    items as the css will be rendered on page with other items!
*/
[ng-controller^="CustomPageController_AIPImmunizationSurvey"] .check-list {
    margin-bottom: 1em;
}

[ng-controller^="CustomPageController_AIPImmunizationSurvey"] .check-list .pb-radiolabel {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    column-gap: 8px;
    margin-bottom: 2.5em;
    line-height: 1.4;
}

[ng-controller^="CustomPageController_AIPImmunizationSurvey"] .check-list .pb-radiolabel > span {
    flex: 1;
}

[ng-controller^="CustomPageController_AIPImmunizationSurvey"] label.preformatted {
    font-weight: normal;
    white-space: pre-line;
}

[ng-controller^="CustomPageController_AIPImmunizationSurvey"] textarea.comment-box {
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 600px;
    height: 12em;
}

[ng-controller^="CustomPageController_AIPImmunizationSurvey"] button.primary[disabled] {
    background-color: #ddd !important;
}

[ng-controller^="CustomPageController_AIPImmunizationSurvey"] a {
    text-decoration: underline;
}

[ng-controller^="CustomPageController_AIPImmunizationSurvey"] .pb-radio {
    margin-top: 1em;
}

[ng-controller^="CustomPageController_AIPImmunizationSurvey"] .pb-form-item-container.pb-textArea {
    padding-left: 15px;
    padding-right: 15px;
}

[ng-controller^="CustomPageController_AIPImmunizationSurvey"] fieldset {
    border: 0 none;
}

</style>
